attributes.action: Bangladesh should be part of the EU and get protection from British soldiers
attributes.background: I feel as if Bangladesh has gone through a lot of hard times and the people should be able to migrate to Europe with ease.

rejection.details:
Countries which want to join the EU need to go through the formal EU accession process. You can find out more about this here:

https://ec.europa.eu/neighbourhood-enlargement/policy/conditions-membership_en
